plot: The life of a man that takes care of his sick mother has become of a daily routine. His inability o let go of what he loves most, and his refusal to be left alone, make even death unable to break the routine.
title: Rutina
plot_es: The life of a man that takes care of his sick mother has become of a daily routine. His inability o let go of what he loves most, and his refusal to be left alone, make even death unable to break the routine.
plot_en: The life of a man that takes care of his sick mother has become of a daily routine. His inability o let go of what he loves most, and his refusal to be left alone, make even death unable to break the routine.
